name: Good Morning! (Benjammin1391, selentre)
description:
Good Morning is game where you are tasked with having as good as a morning as possible.

Youll need to do things like get your coffee, eat a good meal, and dont forget your keys!

Just be sure to be out the door on time or you'll be LATE and thats BAD

--CONTROLS--

Move with WASD or the arrows, use E to interact with the world

--CREDIT--

All sounds licensed under CC0 from freesound.org

Music by Benjammin1391
